# composeViewDelegate

**Instance Property**

The view controller’s delegate

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var composeViewDelegate: (any GKFriendRequestComposeViewControllerDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Before displaying the friend request, your game must set a delegate.
